summary: Wheat is a type of grass whose seeds are used to make many foods. It was first grown around 9600 BC in the Middle East. Today, wheat is the world's second most-produced cereal crop, grown on more land than any other food. It's a key source of carbohydrates and protein. However, some people have health issues when they eat a protein in wheat called gluten. In 2021, the world produced 771 million tons of wheat.
title: Wheat
